title: 'The Unauthorized Saved By The Bell Story' Airs Tonight
teaser: Fans of the Saturday morning sitcom will get a behind-the-scenes look at the cast behind the popular '90s show - or will they?
contentencoded:
Tonight, “The Unauthorized Saved by the Bell Story” airs on the Lifetime network, based on the tell-all book “Behind the Bell” written by cast member Dustin Diamond.

Diamond played Samuel “Screech” Powers on the show, and is also the executive producer of the film.

Former cast members who worked along with Diamond have said that many of the stories in the book are not true, and they do not recall the drama he details.

Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks with NPR’s TV critic Eric Deggans about the drama surrounding “The Unauthorized Saved by the Bell Story.”
